text: Atop the body, the face of the Gorgon stared down, withering and with terrible intent, her hair a mass of foul serpents.
Sharpest is the blade that moves in darkness, for shields cannot deflect that which cannot be anticipated.
This is so Helen can appear on the map in cinematic flybys - no text is needed or will be displayed.
This ribald traveller enjoys wine, music, dancing, and women... preferably all at the same time!
A wise king's greatest weapons are clever words spoken with conviction and verve.
For the chosen of Apollo, knowledge of the future is both a blessing and a curse.
The gods speak to all through the designs of the world, but only a few can decipher their meaning.
